Ofc someone can point you in the right direction but my first comment stands as a more reliable solution long term.

Moving this (provisionally) to Support (unmodded installs) as that sounds more like a bug than anything else.

Please read the [thread=92230]Stock Support and Bug Reporting Guide[/thread], or the [thread=92229]How to Get Support[/thread] sticky if you have mods.
